title: Please help I cannot Start game
body: About 2 days ago, after logging in LOL client, this happened. I could not start game. PLease help! I tried to reinstall but does not work.

replies.body:
Made me giggle a bit, that. Seems your missing the data for the client's header and footer, which is extraordinarily weird.

And a reinstall did not fix this - even weirder. Are you sure it was a complete reinstall? That you used "Programs and Features" to completely remove League and all its components from your computer?
